--- grant_role.sql
GRANT ROLE pii_access, pii_writter TO ROLE hr_manager, hr_director

--- AST
&ast.Grant{
  Grant:     0,
  Privilege: &ast.RolePrivilege{
    Role:  6,
    Names: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 11,
        NameEnd: 21,
        Name:    "pii_access",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 23,
        NameEnd: 34,
        Name:    "pii_writter",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 43,
      NameEnd: 53,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 55,
      NameEnd: 66,
      Name:    "hr_director",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRANT ROLE pii_access, pii_writter TO ROLE hr_manager, hr_director
